unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark Festive Cheer**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark Festive Cheer**

unnormalised: Good news, Chennai folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced beefed-up subsidies for rooftop solar installations, just in time for Diwali!
normalised: Good news, Chennai folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) just announced beefed up subsidies for rooftop solar installations, just in time for Diwali!

unnormalised: Think sunny side up, literally! Now, you can save even more while going green. The subsidy bump applies to residential rooftops under the Surya Ghar Yojana, making solar power more affordable than ever.
normalised: Think sunny side up, literally! Now, you can save even more while going green. The subsidy bump applies to residential rooftops under the Surya Ghar Yojana, making solar power more affordable than ever.

unnormalised: Reports suggest the government is offering up to 40% subsidy for systems up to 3 kW and a tasty deal for larger installations too. Imagine, no more sweating about those crazy summer electricity bills, and more money to spend on Diwali sweets and that new silk saree!
normalised: Reports suggest the government is offering up to forty percent subsidy for systems up to three kilowatt and a tasty deal for larger installations too. Imagine, no more sweating about those crazy summer electricity bills, and more money to spend on Diwali sweets and that new silk saree!

unnormalised: "It's a double dhamaka!" exclaimed Mrs. Sharma from Bangalore, who recently installed a system. "Reduced bills AND feeling good about helping the planet? Time for some extra gulab jamun!"
normalised: "It's a double dhamaka!" exclaimed Missus Sharma from Bangalore, who recently installed a system. "Reduced bills and feeling good about helping the planet? Time for some extra gulab jamun!"

unnormalised: Several state discoms like TANGEDCO are also offering additional incentives, so check your local rules. Don't delay, make like a rocket and get your application in! Install before Onam next year! This could be the best investment you make all year, folks! Let's light up India with solar, one rooftop at a time!
normalised: Several state discoms like T A N G E D C O are also offering additional incentives, so check your local rules. Don't delay, make like a rocket and get your application in! Install before Onam next year! This could be the best investment you make all year, folks! Let's light up India with solar, one rooftop at a time!
